definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: This one masquerades as real, moderate thought.
sentences.chinese: 这一个伪装为真实的，温和的思想。

sentences.english: Its mild, not cold but not dry, young and old Safe.
sentences.chinese: 它的品性温和，不凉不燥，男女老幼皆宜。

sentences.english: Contain long-lasting formula, which is wild and easy to apply color.
sentences.chinese: 蕴含持久配方，质地温和易上色。

sentences.english: The gentle old man lived until the age of 95, going out each day.
sentences.chinese: 这位性情温和的老人一直活到了95岁，每天都出去。

sentences.english: I have friends who, I suspect, secretly scoff at my mild work-out routines.
sentences.chinese: 我疑心有几个朋友偷偷嘲笑我温和的锻炼程序。

sentences.english: Mark twisted the gun from Don's hand with ungentle force.
sentences.chinese: 马克用不温和的力量拧来自君的手枪。

sentences.english: But we were gentle in your midst, as a nursing mother would cherish her own children.
sentences.chinese: 只在你们中间为人温和，如同乳母顾惜自己的孩子。

sentences.english: Chocolate contains phenyl ethylamine, a mild mood elevator.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力含有苯基乙胺，是温和的情绪调节剂。

sentences.english: McGonagall occasionally shows her softer side.
sentences.chinese: 麦格偶尔显示出她温和的一面。

sentences.english: But thou wast ever bravely meek.
sentences.chinese: 但你虽一向温和却很勇敢。

sentences.english: Keep your words soft and tender because tomorrow you may have to eat them.
sentences.chinese: 保持言语温和，说不定明天你就自食其言。

sentences.english: The softer, pastel colours contribute to that goal.
sentences.chinese: 温和淡雅的颜色能达到这一目的。

sentences.english: I recommend finding a gentler sulfate free shampoo and a reconstructive treatment mask.
sentences.chinese: 我需要发现一种温和免洗方法和一个改造的治疗罩。

sentences.english: It occurs to me that the greatest gentleness would put a bullet into his bright eye.
sentences.chinese: 我想那最伟大的温和将会把一颗子弹射入他明亮的眼。

sentences.english: Grandmother appeared in the light, so mildness and kindliness.
sentences.chinese: 奶奶出现在亮光里，是那么温和，那么慈爱。

sentences.english: Is a disposition a recommendation in a wife?
sentences.chinese: 温和蹬性情是做妻子的可取桩郸吗？

definition: Pinghe county in Zhangzhou 漳州[Zhang1 zhou1], Fujian
to dwindle/to vanish/to make vanish/to exercise restraint/to curb (one's mirth, arrogance etc)/to astringe/(math.) to converge
to ease (tension)/to alleviate/to moderate/to allay/to make more mild
to ease (tension)/to relax/to cause sth to relax/to alleviate/relaxed/easy and unhurried/leisurely/soothing/mild (slope)
